name: v0.6.0rc1
body:
WORKSPACE snippet:
```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_testing",
    sha256 = "c06835f9e2858edbbcda79dd728e3caedcbd43a1234014ff2884cf57a93f280c",
    strip_prefix = "rules_testing-0.6.0rc1",
    url = "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_testing/releases/download/v0.6.0rc1/rules_testing-v0.6.0rc1.tar.gz",
)
```


<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v0.6.0rc1 -->

## What's Changed
### Other Changes
* chore: Disable Bzlmod explicitly for workspace setup by @meteorcloudy in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_testing/pull/73
* chore: fix order of loads to satisfy buildifier check by @copybara-service in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_testing/pull/74
* docs: document 0.4.0 and 0.5.0 changes by @copybara-service in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_testing/pull/77
* chore: upgrade (dev only dependency) rules_python 0.22.0 -> 0.27.0 by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_testing/pull/81
* feat: allow custom target-under-test attributes by @copybara-service in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_testing/pull/78
* Add support for provider maps to rules_testing by @copybara-service in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_testing/pull/83
* Update changlog for 0.6.0 release by @copybara-service in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_testing/pull/85
* breaks internal tests by @copybara-service in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_testing/pull/86
* Roll forward of "Add support for provider maps to rules_testing" by @copybara-service in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_testing/pull/87
* Fix expect.that_struct. It is currently broken, since it won't take in attrs, and attrs in a mandatory attribute for the new function on a struct. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_testing/pull/90

## New Contributors
* @meteorcloudy made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_testing/pull/73

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_testing/compare/v0.5.0...v0.6.0rc1

<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v0.6.0 -->

## What's Changed
### Other Changes
* chore: Disable Bzlmod explicitly for workspace setup by @meteorcloudy in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_testing/pull/73
* chore: fix order of loads to satisfy buildifier check by @copybara-service in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_testing/pull/74
* docs: document 0.4.0 and 0.5.0 changes by @copybara-service in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_testing/pull/77
* chore: upgrade (dev only dependency) rules_python 0.22.0 -> 0.27.0 by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_testing/pull/81
* feat: allow custom target-under-test attributes by @copybara-service in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_testing/pull/78
* Add support for provider maps to rules_testing by @copybara-service in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_testing/pull/83
* Update changlog for 0.6.0 release by @copybara-service in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_testing/pull/85
* breaks internal tests by @copybara-service in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_testing/pull/86
* Roll forward of "Add support for provider maps to rules_testing" by @copybara-service in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_testing/pull/87
* Fix expect.that_struct. It is currently broken, since it won't take in attrs, and attrs in a mandatory attribute for the new function on a struct. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_testing/pull/90
* Add env.expect.that_value to the changelog. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_testing/pull/92

## New Contributors
* @meteorcloudy made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_testing/pull/73

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_testing/compare/v0.5.0...v0.6.0

## What's Changed
### Other Changes
* Add default_applicable_licenses to lib package. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_testing/pull/38
* cleanup: upgrade to rules_python 0.22.0 by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_testing/pull/39
* cleanup: Upgrade to stardoc 0.5.6 and enable bzlmod for building docs by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_testing/pull/40
* feat: Support unit test (non-analysis test) types of tests in rules_testing by @copybara-service in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_testing/pull/46


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_testing/compare/v0.1.0...v0.2.0

name: v0.0.5
body:
**WARNING:** This version is broken with bzlmod

WORKSPACE snippet:
```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_testing",
    sha256 = "0c2abee201f566a088c720e12bc1d968bc56e6a51b692d9c81b1fe861bdf2be2",
    strip_prefix = "rules_testing-0.0.5",
    url = "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_testing/releases/download/v0.0.5/rules_testing-v0.0.5.tar.gz",
)
```


<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v0.0.5 -->

## What's Changed
### Other Changes
* tests: add bzlmod coverage to CI config by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_testing/pull/19
* docs: Make bzl files processable by stardoc. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_testing/pull/20
* docs: split docs into more user-friendly docs. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_testing/pull/22
* cleanup: Deduplicate variables in compare_contains_exactly_predicates by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_testing/pull/30
* Generate docs using Sphinx and Readthedocs by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_testing/pull/28
* fix: Record match for matching in-order elements by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_testing/pull/29

## New Contributors
* @fmeum made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_testing/pull/30

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_testing/compare/v0.0.4...v0.0.5

## What's Changed
### Other Changes
* fix: Remove google-internal path from file_subject_test by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_testing/pull/8
* Add simple end-to-end tests for bzlmod. by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_testing/pull/9
* test: Ignore nested workspaces so //... works in the main repo. by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_testing/pull/13
* tests: Remove google-internal path from target_subject_test by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_testing/pull/14
* style: fix buildifier warnings by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_testing/pull/16
* cleanup: default visibility to private by @copybara-service in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_testing/pull/17
* fix: make fail use correct attribute name by @copybara-service in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_testing/pull/18

## New Contributors
* @copybara-service made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_testing/pull/17

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_testing/compare/v0.0.3...v0.0.4

## What's Changed
### Other Changes
* Test automatic import to Google by @kotlaja in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_testing/pull/1
* Add AUTHORS, OWNERS, and gitignore files by @kotlaja in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_testing/pull/2
* Add basic bazelci configuration by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_testing/pull/4
* Add release workflow by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_testing/pull/3
* Move release workflow into workflows directory. by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_testing/pull/5

## New Contributors
* @kotlaja made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_testing/pull/1
* @rickeylev made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_testing/pull/4

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_testing/commits/v0.0.2
